subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derek Fisher completed his widely anticipated return to the Los Angeles Lakers yesterday by agreeing to a three-year contract reported to be worth $14 million.Fisher, a 32-year-old guard, asked to be released from his contract with the Utah Jazz just over two weeks ago so he could move to a city with more advanced medical care for his 1-year-old daughter, Tatum, who has a rare form of eye cancer. He played for the Lakers when they won N.B.A. championships in 2000, 2001 and 2002.
